messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] OT Blaine MN - Help a canuck?
messages.msgSnippet: Good luck Tim! I m still searching for more unschoolers in Minnesota!  :) I know some from my Minnesota list,  but none in Blaine. Kelli~ ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Good luck Tim!

I'm still searching for more unschoolers in Minnesota! :)

I know some from my Minnesota list, but none in Blaine.



Kelli~


----- Original Message -----
From: tmthomas@...
To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 11, 2003 1:36 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] OT Blaine MN - Help a canuck?



Anyone from Blaine MN? Looking at the work your public library is doing and would love an off-line chat about them.

Cheers
Tim T in PG BC
